name: rapeseed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant with yellow flowers from which oil and animal food are produced: We tramped through fields of ripening rapeseed. The country's rapeseed crop was last month damaged by extreme weather.
More examplesFewer examplesSome traders are offering schemes to put rapeseed into store and sell it later.Farmers had unwittingly planted conventional rapeseed contaminated with GM material.Growing rapeseed on the land could produce bio-diesel to replace 50-60% of the tractor diesel used on the farm.
